subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: John Daly has been cut loose by the swing coach Butch Harmon, who said he was not going to waste his time with Daly because he was more interested in socializing than working on his golf game.
snippet: John Daly has been cut loose by the swing coach Butch Harmon, who said he was not going to waste his time with Daly because he was more interested in socializing than working on his golf game.
